SQL Tools Service

SQL Tools Service provides core functionality for build SQL Server tools.

User Guide

The User Guide describes the high level design of this project and gives guidance on how to use it.

API Reference

The API Reference contains details about the .NET API.

Getting Help

Please feel free to file an issue on our GitHub issue tracker page.

Contributing

We would love to incorporate community contributions into this project. If you would like to contribute code, documentation, tests, or bug reports, please read our Contribution Guide to learn more.
